titleStmt.title: Bloody news from Clarken-well being a true relation of a horrid murther committed by John Mason upon Gregory Reeves at Mr. Hues, a bakers ... upon Munday night last, being the ninth of July ... : also how he was apprehended, and his examination and confession before Justice Powel on Tuesday last ... : together with a true and exact narrative of a bloody murther committed by a souldiers wife on her husband ... on Wednesday last, with her examination and confession : this is an exact relation as it was brought from Mr. Hues the Bakers in Clarkenwell.

Bloody news from Clarken-well being a true relation of a horrid murther committed by John Mason upon Gregory Reeves at Mr. Hues, a bakers ... upon Munday night last, being the ninth of July ... : also how he was apprehended, and his examination and confession before Justice Powel on Tuesday last ... : together with a true and exact narrative of a bloody murther committed by a souldiers wife on her husband ... on Wednesday last, with her examination and confession : this is an exact relation as it was brought from Mr. Hues the Bakers in Clarkenwell.

notesStmt.note: Caption title (p. 3): An exact relation of a bloody murther committed at Clarken-well on Munday last.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
